name: Burg_244
culture_notes: Diet heavy on salted fish and seaweed
Tide-blessing festivals tied to fishing seasons
Local craftwork: carved figureheads and nets
constraints: Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
Long-range mind-influence is banned and rare
No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
notes: Small pier with a ruined beacon used for navigation auguries
Seasonal surge of travelers during tide-festivals
